DisplayName.Value: Combined Theme Train Variation Asset Pack

ShortDescription.Value: This Pack adds 14 cross-theme train variations, consisting of different lengths

Publish.LongDescription:
## Combined Theme Train Variation Asset Pack This Pack adds a total of 14 trains to the game. You can now use NA trains in EU maps and vice versa. All train lengths from the Original "Train Variation Asset Pack" are included. You don't need the original mod if you are using this one instead.
## New Assets - EU/NA Passenger Train (3 Segment) (cap. 240) - EU/NA Passenger Train (4 Segment) (cap. 360) - EU/NA Passenger Train (5 Segment) (cap. 480) - EU/NA Passenger Train (6 Segment) (cap. 600) - EU/NA Passenger Train (7 Segment) (cap. 720) - EU/NA Passenger Train (8 Segment, Vanilla) (cap. 840) - EU/NA Passenger Train (2x3 Segments) (cap. 480)
